title: Wide-Open and Wout’s to Lose: Why Van Aert and Visma-Lease a Bike Can’t Win at the Omloop
content:
No Van der Poel and Pedersen leaves Van Aert six-star favorite for classics opener, but no 'big three' makes it only an appetizer ahead of the spring's biggest prizes.

Read the full article at Wide-Open and Wout’s to Lose: Why Van Aert and Visma-Lease a Bike Can’t Win at the Omloop on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
